projects.title: Bird Species Classification
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a deep-learning model for precise bird species identification and deployed using streamlit.
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Used Robotic Process Automation for fetching description of birds.
 - Dark Mode support.

projects.title: Hand Gesture Controlled Presentation
projects.bodyText:
- The Hand Gesture Controlled Presentation project aims to develop a system that allows users to control presentations using hand gestures instead of traditional input devices like a keyboard or mouse.
 - Improve accessibility for individuals with mobility impairments or those who prefer hands-free interaction, providing an alternative means of controlling presentations.

projects.title: Lip Reading Streamlit App
projects.bodyText:
- An innovative application designed to interpret spoken words through lip movement analysis.
 -  Utilizing advanced machine learning techniques and computer vision, the app processes video input to predict the spoken words without relying on audio.
 - Built with Streamlit for an interactive and user-friendly interface, the app enables users to upload their videos and receive real-time predictions.

projects.title: Career Prediction Model
projects.bodyText:
- A Web application designed to predict optimal career paths for individuals based on various input parameters such as skills, education, interests, and work experience.
 - The application leverages machine learning algorithms to analyze user data and provide personalized career recommendations.
 - Built with Django, it ensures robust backend development, efficient data handling, and seamless integration with predictive models.

projects.title: Power Bi Analytics Dashboard
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a dashboard in Power BI utilizing data from an Excel file.
 - The dashboard effectively visualizes and analyzes the given data.

projects.title: Machine Learning Algorithms
projects.bodyText: - This project showcases basic machine learning programs I developed during my studies, written in Python, intended for educational use or as a foundation for more advanced projects.

projects.title: SQL Data Analysis Project
projects.bodyText:
- The project involves analyzing data for pizza sales company.
 - Utilizing SQL to tackle and resolve a range of data analysis questions related to the dataset .
 - This project is essential for gaining foundational to advanced knowledge of SQL.
